banner: Welcome to House of Holmes - Luxury Interior Design

hero.title: Crafting Excellence
hero.tagline: Where vision meets precision in every stitch

service1.title: Product Development
service1.desc: Our technical team can take your ideas from concept to reality with patternmaking, grading, and engineering skills. You think it, we create it.

service2.title: Sample Making
service2.desc: Sample making services for sportswear, athletic wear, evening, tailoring, etc. We handle pre-production to custom sewing.

service3.title: Technical Design
service3.desc: We produce comprehensive technical design packages so your product remains consistent and quality-driven globally.

service4.title: Production
service4.desc: From established brands to small designers, we deliver 100% Made in USA production with strict quality control processes.

about.title: About House of Holmes
about.content: House of Holmes is a premier fashion atelier blending timeless craftsmanship with modern design. Our collections reflect our commitment to excellence and the finest details, empowering clients with elegance. We take pride in our dedication to quality and craftsmanship, ensuring that every piece that leaves our atelier meets the highest standards of excellence. Our team of skilled artisans and designers brings years of experience and passion to every project. Located in Mesa, Arizona, we serve clients nationwide who share our vision for exceptional fashion and impeccable attention to detail. Our commitment to 100% Made in USA manufacturing ensures both quality control and support for local craftsmanship.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.addressValue: 1457 W Southern Ave, Unit #15, Mesa, AZ 85202

footer.rights: All rights reserved. Made in USA.

missionValues.title: Mission & Values
missionValues.missionContent: To revolutionize American manufacturing through ethical practices, innovative design, and unwavering commitment to quality craftsmanship.
missionValues.visionContent: To be the leading force in sustainable, domestic textile production while empowering designers and brands to create exceptional products.

pricing.title: Pricing & Services
pricing.note: All prices are estimates and may vary based on project complexity and requirements.
pricing.rushFee: Rush Fee: Additional 25% for expedited services
